| Property | Attribute | Description                                        | Type                  | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `gap`    | `gap`     | Removes the default gap between elements passed in | `"default" \| "none"` | `'default'` |
